mcp_research.hybrid_search¶

mcp_research.hybrid_search.ensure_collection(client: QdrantClient, collection_name: str, dense_dim: int) → None[source]¶
Create a collection with:

  • named dense vector: “dense”

  • named sparse vector: “sparse” (with IDF modifier enabled)

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured¶

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured.collect_pdfs(target: Path) → List[Path][source]¶

Resolve a single PDF or all PDFs in a directory.

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured.elements_to_chunks(elements) → Tuple[List[str], List[List[int]]][source]¶

Normalize Unstructured API elements into chunk text + page hints.

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured.ingest_pdfs(pdfs: Sequence[Path], unstructured_client: UnstructuredClient, strategy: str, chunking_strategy: str | None, max_characters: int, overlap: int, languages: List[str] | None, partitions_dir: Path, chunks_dir: Path) → List[dict][source]¶

Partition PDFs with Unstructured and dump partitions/chunks to disk.

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured.load_dotenv(path: Path) → None[source]¶

Load a simple KEY=VALUE .env file into the process environment.

mcp_research.ingest_unstructured.partition_pdf(client: UnstructuredClient, pdf_path: Path, strategy: str, chunking_strategy: str | None, max_characters: int | None, overlap: int | None, languages: List[str] | None)[source]¶

Call the Unstructured API to partition (and optionally chunk) a PDF.
